about_the_game:
"Veldarune" is an exciting base-building and creature-collecting adventure set in a world teetering on the brink of destruction. The once-strong magical barrier protecting a peaceful kingdom is weakening, and dangerous monsters are closing in. Only one hope remains: You—the Tamer, summoned from another world with the unique ability to bond with powerful creatures and turn the tide in this desperate battle.

  • Defend Your Kingdom: During the day, gather resources, build and upgrade your base, and prepare for the nightly onslaught of monsters. You'll need a strong foundation and smart strategies to survive the attacks.

  • Tame Creatures: Venture into the wild, where you'll find all sorts of incredible creatures roaming the forests. But it’s not enough to just find them—you’ll need to earn their trust and bond with them, unlocking their potential to fight alongside you.

  • Heal and Protect: As a healer, your role is more than just fighting. While your creatures battle the monsters, you’ll use your healing powers to keep them alive, making sure your defenses hold strong through each night.

  • Wander the Forests: Explore lush forests, dark caves, and mysterious landscapes to find rare creatures and hidden secrets. Every corner of the world is filled with new possibilities, from magical creatures to ancient relics.

  • Tame Over 50 Unique Creatures: From massive beasts to tiny, mystical beings, each creature is unique and can be tamed to fight by your side. Build your ideal team of allies to face the growing threat.

  • Discover Ancient Relics: Uncover the forgotten knowledge of the kingdom’s past. Hidden throughout the land are ancient relics that can power up your base and creatures, giving you the edge you need to survive.

  • Build a Stronghold: Design and customize your base to your heart’s content. Upgrade structures, set up defenses, and create the ultimate safe haven for your creatures.

  • Craft and Collect: Gather ingredients to brew potions, craft powerful gear, and create tools that will help you survive the wilderness and the enemy attacks.

  • Enhance Your Skills: Grow stronger with each battle. Unlock new abilities, improve your healing powers, and tailor your skills to fit your playstyle.

  • Form Bonds with Creatures: Your creatures aren’t just tools of war—they’re companions. Earn their trust, train them, and watch them grow alongside you as you face tougher challenges.

  • Grow Your Own Food: Cultivate crops to feed yourself and your creatures. Gather resources, and use what you harvest to craft new items and potions.

  • Defend Against the Night: When the sun sets, monsters will attack. Your creatures will take up arms, but only with your healing powers can you ensure their survival. The stronger your bond with them, the better they fight.

Your adventure begins now—a journey of building, bonding, and battling to save a kingdom on the edge of destruction. Tame the creatures, defend your base, and become the hero the kingdom desperately needs!

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
